## Helper.toObject() function

Converts value to a plain object flattening inherited enumerable properties of value to own properties of the plain object.

**Signature:**

```typescript
toObject: (value?: any) => any
```

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

value


</td><td>

any


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The value to convert.  Returns the converted plain object.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

any
